abstract: 6 Q's About the News | Why is Atlanta a new contender for "zombie capital" of the United States?

lead_paragraph: WHY has Atlanta magazine dubbed that city the "zombie capital of the world"?WHY do you think so many people want to be extras on "The Walking Dead"?

headline.main: Zombies Turn Up the Heat in Atlanta
